KaTeX KaTeX shortcode let you render math typesetting in markdown document. Mermaid Chart Mermaid is library for generating svg charts and diagrams from text. Example {{< mermaid [class="text-center"]>}} sequenceDiagram Alice->>Bob: Hello Bob, how are you? alt is sick Bob->>Alice: Not so good :( else is well Bob->>Alice: Feeling fresh like a daisy end opt Extra response Bob->>Alice: Thanks for asking end {{< /mermaid >}} mermaid.initialize({ flowchart: { useMaxWidth:true } }); sequenceDiagram Alice-Bob: Hello Bob, how are you?
